segments.text: Thank you for organizing this great baby shower for me ! I ’ Ve always been to baby showers but never actually had one held for me ! Let ’ s get started !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , let ’ s start opening some presents !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh look ! What a great little bib for the baby ! This will definitely come in handy ! Oh wow , you also got me a stroller ! That ’ s so great ! Thank you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This next one is from Betty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A highchair and car seat ! Wow Betty , thank you so much ! I really appreciate it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A playpen and crib ! Thanks Carla ! This is just what I needed !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , that ’ s all of them . No more gifts . Now who wants to guess when the baby is due ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Umm . I think my water just broke ! Get me to a hospital !
segments.speaker: S1
